name: morning-briefing
prompt: Morning market briefing. Run: 1) `botcore get_market_prices` 2) `botcore get_market_overview` 3) `botcore get_paper_open_trades`. Create a SHORT briefing (under 800 chars) with: top coin prices, 24h changes, open positions. Then send it to Telegram by running `botcore send_telegram_notification` with the briefing text.
